December 13, 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-first-open-multi-cloud-serverless-platform-for-the-enterprise-is-here-try-out-pivotal-function-service-today?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1544203863?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The First Open, Multi-Cloud Serverless Platform for the Enterprise Is Here We're excited to announce that Pivotal Function Service is available as an alpha release. Try it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-first-open-multi-cloud-serverless-platform-for-the-enterprise-is-here-try-out-pivotal-function-service-today?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1544203863?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/happy-monday-how-to-fix-a-kubernetes-cve-before-your-boss-and-the-rest-of-the-world-reads-about-it?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How To Fix a Kubernetes CVE Before Bad Actors (And Your Boss) Discover It What if all your Kubernetes environments were already patched before a CVE is announced? That's where PKS comes in. With it, automated patching of Kubernetes is a routine, automated task—sans drama. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/happy-monday-how-to-fix-a-kubernetes-cve-before-your-boss-and-the-rest-of-the-world-reads-about-it?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/videos/platform-is-product-at-express-scripts?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Platform is Product at Express Scripts Kurt Glore, Director of Cloud Engineering at Express Scripts, sits down with Jeff Kelly to discuss how Express Scripts is driving PCF education with their developer cloud academy. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/in-2019-put-a-platform-as-a-product-strategy-in-place?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/create-customer-value-like-faang-continuous-delivery-via-spinnaker?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Create Customer Value Like FAANG: Continuous Delivery via Spinnaker What's the secret to the excellent market performance of the top names in tech?
